Blog.post: Hi all, Today I will be flying to GA, so that may not be very many post for to next 6 days. I will try to post atleast one while up there. -Joey
Hi all, Just a heads up seagate rised the warranties of thier drives to five years, hopefully this will start a trend for other Hard Disc Drives. So if you are looking for a new HDD go seagate. -Joey
A German court has ruled that parts 2,3, and 4 of the GNU GPL are valid under German law. Hopfully this will set a tread for other places. -Joey

Today on the most updated website ./ there was an artice (link at end). " reverse firewalls should be embedded in every cable modem and wireless access point for home users. "A traditional firewall is designed to stop attacks from the outside coming in; a reverse firewall stops an attack going out' The Story: http://www.zdnet.com.au/insight/security/0,39023764,39154033,00.htm [tinfoil_hat_on] 1. What if I where to have a good reason to send loads of e-mail? 2. Whould these firewalls keep logs, and if so, who would have access to them. 3. This sound alot like microsoft Trusted Computing project, bad idea [tinfoil_hat_off] -Joey

Hi, The world's most popular website http://www.slashdot.org is down root@technomancer:~# ping slashdot.org PING slashdot.org (66.35.250.150) 56(84) bytes of data. From slashdot.org (66.35.250.150) icmp_seq=1 Destination Port Unreachable Seems like they are having DNS issues or ./ got ./ed -Joey

I was reading ./ and saw this (http://www.cnn.com/2004/TECH/07/14/telecom.secrecy.ap/index.html) what it says is that ISPs and cell phone providers don't have to report outages. This reminds me of a time that a person in the government thought that by making it a requirement to have car insurance would lower the price. -Joey

[rant] I was reading this (http://slate.msn.com/id/2103823/) article and I'm not sure what is worse, A person getting 3200 e-mails from people tell him why they are tired, someone taking the time to write a story, or someone wasting bandwidth to host is. A above all it was on Slashdot. [/rant] -Joey

If you still use IE watch out, 4 more hole where found today.[rant] A hole in IE, that can't be right, IE is a good browser, that is why Mr. Gates put it on my computer.[/rant] I'm glad I use a secure OS.

Hi, Just a little info about Me. I am a 15 year old male who lives in tampa, Fl. I Am studying to get my linux+ cert from comptia. My computers (I'm only listing my desktop, not my servers): Proc: AMD XP 2800+ Mem: 768 PC2700 GPU: Nvidia FX5600XT 128MB OS: Slackware Linux current name: technomancer -Joey
I just got a google e-mail address 8^)

I just got back from GA. I had a blast I hiked ppart of the apalation trail, Setup two linux boxs, prefromed many simple IT tasks and hopefully on the 21st I will taking the linux+ exam. I wish I could go to LWE. -Joey
